title: Crypto Charts See Green With Altcoins Despite Bitcoin's Price Drop
author: Radhika Parashar
synopsis: Along with Bitcoin and Ether, Dogecoin and Shiba Inu also tumbled into dips. Several altcoins however, managed to maintain the green quotient on crypto price charts. The gainers include Tether, Cardano, Polygon, and Chainlink among others.

title: Worlds 10 richest men doubled their wealth during pandemic, Oxfam reports
author: NEWS WIRES
synopsis: The worlds 10 wealthiest men doubled their fortunes during the first two years of the coronavirus pandemic as poverty and inequality soared, a report said on Monday.

title: China's birth rate drops to record low in 2021 - Reuters
author: Liangping Gao, Tony Munroe and Ryan Woo
synopsis: Mainland China's birth rate dropped to a record low of 7.52 per 1,000 people in 2021, National Bureau of Statistics data showed on Monday, accelerating a downward trend that led Beijing last year to begin allowing couples to have up to three children.

title: China’s Economy Slowed Late Last Year on Real Estate Troubles - The New York Times
author: Keith Bradsher
synopsis: Economic output climbed 4 percent in the last quarter of 2021, slowing from the previous period that ran July through September. Growth has faltered lately as home buyers and consumers become cautious.

title: U.S. FAA clears 45% of commercial plane fleet after 5G deployed - Fox Business
author: Reuters
synopsis: The FAA said Sunday it had cleared an estimated 45% of the U.S. commercial airplane fleet to perform low-visibility landings at many airports where 5G C-band will be deployed
